Vrep Balance Environment¶

class rl_environments.vrep.balancebot_vrep_balance.BalanceBotVrepEnvBalance(server_addr='127.0.0.1', server_port=19997, scene_path='C:\Program Files\V-REP3\V-REP_PRO\scenes/balance_bot_ram.ttt')[source]¶
compute_action(action)[source]¶

Transform the action vector This version of thefunction translate the predicted action into translation.

Parameters

action – predicted action

Returns

Action in the form of ratio of motor power -1 to 1

compute_reward()[source]¶

Calculates the dense reward for the environment and adds a sparse reward for achieving the goal

If the goal has been achieved a new goal is sampled.

Returns

reward (sparse) + reward (goal_achievement)

sample_goal()[source]¶

Samples the goal space for an XY coordinate but returns only the Y as a goal

The goal generated is only for learning to balance and translate, not including rotation.

Returns

numpy float array

validate_goal()[source]¶

Check if the goal has been reached and maintained for X amount of time.

Returns

boolean, based on wether the goal has been achieved or not.=
